code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import AuthService from'../services/AuthService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await AuthService.login(username,password);navigate('/simulators');}catch(error){alert("아이디 또는 비밀번호가 일치하지 않습니다.");}};const handleRegister=()=>{navigate('/register');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleRegister,children:"Join"})]});};export default LoginForm;
